Package space.sunqian.common.net

Interface NetClient<A,C extends Channel>

Type Parameters:
A - the type of the address in the network
C - the type of the underlying channel
All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
All Known Subinterfaces:
TcpClient
public interface NetClient<A,C extends Channel> extends Cloneable
This interface represents a network client, based on an underlying Channel.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    C
    channel()
    Returns the underlying channel of this client.
    void
    close()
    Disconnects and closes this client.
    boolean
    isClosed()
    Returns whether this client is closed.
    boolean
    isConnected()
    Returns whether this client connects to the server.
    A
    localAddress()
    Returns the address this client is bound to.
    A
    remoteAddress()
    Returns the remote address this client connects to.

  • Method Details

    • close

      void close() throws NetException
      Disconnects and closes this client.
      Throws:
      NetException - if any error occurs

    • remoteAddress

      @Nonnull A remoteAddress()
      Returns the remote address this client connects to.

      If the client is closed, it still returns the address at which the connection was alive.

      Returns:
      the remote address this client connects to

    • localAddress

      @Nonnull A localAddress()
      Returns the address this client is bound to.

      If the client is closed, it still returns the address at which the connection was alive.

      Returns:
      the address this client is bound to

    • isConnected

      boolean isConnected()
      Returns whether this client connects to the server.
      Returns:
      whether this client connects to the server

    • isClosed

      boolean isClosed()
      Returns whether this client is closed.
      Returns:
      whether this client is closed

    • channel

      @Nonnull C channel()
      Returns the underlying channel of this client.
      Returns:
      the underlying channel of this client
